H0.text: Which U.S. state was the first to legalize same-sex marriage, in 2004. California

H1.text: Which U.S. state was the first to legalize same-sex marriage, in 2004. New York

H2.text: Which U.S. state was the first to legalize same-sex marriage, in 2004. Vermont

H3.text: Which U.S. state was the first to legalize same-sex marriage, in 2004. Mass.

A4.text: Massachusetts was the first U.S. state to open marriage to same-sex couples.

A5.text: Same-sex marriage has been legally recognized in Massachusetts since May 17, 2004.
